video_prompt: Woman's expression shifts from serious to contemplative. Her smart glasses display active, glowing blue interfaces, reflecting dynamically in her eyes. Subtle highlights in her hair flicker from pink/purple to blue. The earpiece pulses with blue light, and the metallic jacket reflects changing ambient city lights. Neon background lights subtly undulate and morph. Her lips show a subtle shift of gloss.
image_prompt: Close-up, eye-level, highly detailed digital art portrait of a futuristic/cyberpunk young woman. She wears sleek, transparent smart glasses with glowing blue internal displays, casting a subtle blue light on her face and large brown eyes. Her dark hair has subtle pink/purple and blue highlights, framing her face with bangs. She has smooth, dewy skin with freckles and full, dark pink lips. An elaborate, light-up earpiece is on her right, connected by a dark wire. She wears a white garment under a reflective silver jacket with pink/blue reflections, and glowing blue tech cables/circuitry around her neck. The soft, neon-lit pink and blue background suggests a futuristic cityscape. Emphasize a blend of human beauty and advanced digital integration, clean, sharp, and highly detailed.
refined_video_prompt: Her expression transitions from serious to contemplative. Smart glasses interfaces glow and shift, dynamically reflecting in her eyes. Hair highlights flicker, transitioning from pink/purple to blue. The earpiece pulses with blue light. Her metallic jacket dynamically reflects shifting city lights. Neon background lights undulate and subtly morph. Lip gloss subtly shifts.
